## Issue Type
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect/outdated information
- [ ] Unclear/confusing content
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Formatting issues
- [ ] Typos/grammar
- [ ] Missing examples
- [ ] Accessibility issues
